text:
In ./build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/log4j.properties that comes in
cocoon-lenya-latest-bin.exe, the line
./build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/log4j.properties:log4j.appender.A1.File=C:/build/tomcat-4.1.27/webapps/lenya/WEB-INF/logs/log4j.log
shouldn't hard code the path. The value
log4j.appender.A1.File=./build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/logs/log4j.log
seems to work fine.
creator: dwampler@bridgeport-networks.com

text:
This works in the 1.2RC3 binary for Windows.

But what about the cvs-version? Are any manual modifications of configuration 
files necessary?

The releases, release candidates, and snapshots need to be built with log4j
disabled within build.properties (or don't use build.properties at all)
